h1.pt: Oi! Eu sou a Giulia Cardieri

h2.en: An UI developer based in Brazil

en.text: I'm Giulia Cardieri, an UI developer and Human-Computer Interaction (HCI) Researcher located in Sorocaba, Brazil. I enjoy creating visually pleasing and accessible web applications, besides researching about how web technologies affect end-users.

In 2019 I got my master's degree in Computer Science (on the HCI field) from Universidade Federal de SÃ£o Carlos (UFSCar Sorocaba). I developed an approach called PWA-EU that assists developers to create PWAs that empowers end-users.
Since 2018, I work as a UI developer freelancer at Toptal.

I'm a CSS and Women in Tech enthusiast. I co-organize/speak/attend events in those fields, such as Rails Girls Sorocaba. I believe the people who are already working with technology (yeah, that includes me and maybe you) should share their experiences and knowledge in order to create a more welcoming place to those who are starting, as the technology field has its challenges.
